attributes.action: Hold a general election as soon as possible
attributes.additional_details:
The country is in crisis on so many fronts, the Prime Minister and cabinet have lost the support of the majority of electors. And their trust. The government has been mired in its own problems and seems to have lost sight of the real priorities. At the moment the best we can hope for is a temporary tinkering that may or may not address some of the many serious issues.
The current administration has lost its mandate, What is needed now is for a General Election to re-shape government, whichever party is successful.
attributes.background: Debate whether it is possible to hold a general election at the earliest possible opportunity, rather than wait until the end of this parliament.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
